text:
e="preserve">Rahat Khan (19 December 1940 – 28 August 2020) was a Bangladeshi journalist and novelist. He wrote more than 32 novels. He was an editor for "The Daily Ittefaq".
He won Bangla Academy Literary Award in 1973 and Ekushey Padak in 1996 by the Government of Bangladesh.
Khan died on 28 August 2020 in Dhaka at the age of 79.
